item.description:
Take time out from the holiday bustle to recharge and replenish!

Each Chakra stores the collection of our core beliefs, emotions and experiences in correlation to seven fundamental themes in our life:


  • survival
  • creativity
  • power
  • love
  • self-expression
  • wisdom, and
  • divine connection


In this dynamic solo meditation you will:


  • awaken your sexual/ life force energy
  • charge your system with creative vitality
  • clear and cleans each vital energy center
  • release past residue
  • expand your orgasmic range
  • ignite your clarity, personal power and ability to manifest!



    Develop your solo practice within the context of a potent, supportive energy field.

    No previous experience necessary.
    Wear loose, comfortable clothing. Mats will be provided. Bring a water bottle.

    Fridays, 7:30-9:30pm, 12/11, 1/8, 2/12, 3/12, 4/9, 5/7,* 6/11
    (2nd Friday of the month, except *1st Fri)

    $20 prepay through PayPal
    $25 cash or check at the door
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the door to the left of the Burren Pub. We are upstairs at the back.
item.name: Monthly Chakra Loop Breath Journey
